name: The Book of Leviticus Quiz | Old Testament / Tanakh | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is credited with writing Leviticus?
questions.explanation:
Moses.

	Moses wrote the first five books of The Bible.

questions.text: According to Leviticus 11:4 which of the following animals is unclean?
questions.explanation:
camel.

	Levitcus 11:4: "Nevertheless these shall ye not eat of them that chew the cud, or of them that divide the hoof; as the camel, because he cheweth the cud, but divideth not the hoof, he is unclean to you."

questions.text: How many days is a woman unclean after having a baby boy?
questions.explanation:
7 days.

	Leviticus 12:2 "Speak unto the children of Israel, saying if a woman have conceived seed, and born a man child: then she shall be unclean for seven days; according to the days of the separation for her infirmity shall she be unclean."

questions.text: According to Leviticus, on which day of the baby's life should he be circumcised (normally)?
options: before the baby is potty trained
questions.explanation:
8th day.

	Leviticus 12:3 "And in the eighth day the flesh of the foreskin shall be circumcised."  (This may be postponed for medical reasons).

questions.text: What shall Aaron offer as a sin offering in Leviticus 16:3?
questions.explanation:
bullock.

	Leviticus 16:3 "Thus shall Aaron come into the holy place, with a young bullock for a sin offering , and a ram for a burnt offering."

questions.text: Fill in the blank from this verse in Leviticus 17:11 - "For the life of the flesh is in the ______________ and I have given it to you upon the altar to make the atonement for your souls; for it is the blood that maketh an atonement for the soul."
questions.explanation:
blood.

	The book of Leviticus is also known as "The Law".

questions.text: Does the Bible contain passages against homosexuality?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Leviticus 18:22 says, "Thou shalt not lie with mankind, as with womankind; it is abomination. Leviticus 12:13 says, "If a man also lie with mankind as he lieth with a woman, both of them have committed an abomination; they shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them." I'd like to also point out that while many laws of Leviticus still remain today, the punishments are no longer as drastic. Back in the Old Testament days you could be stoned to death for many things, including talking back to your parents. Christians believe that after Christ died for everyone's sins, he took that death punishment so that we would not have to die for our own sins.

questions.text: Which pair of words, completes this verse from Leviticus 19:14? "Thou shalt not curse the ____________, nor put a stumbling block before the __________, but shalt fear thy God; I am the Lord."
questions.explanation:
deaf, blind.

	I always like this verse because many people think that a person with a disability is worthless and should be killed. This verse says that God doesn't feel that people with disabilities are worthless.

questions.text: What does Leviticus say will happen to the man if a man has sex with an animal?
questions.explanation:
He'll be put to death.

	Leviticus 20:15 "And if a man lie with a beast he shall surely be put to death: and ye shall slay the beast." Sex with animals is called bestiality.

questions.text: A mountain is the last thing mentioned in Leviticus. Which mountain is it?
questions.explanation:
Mount Sinai.

	The last verse in Leviticus is Leviticus 27:34 "There are the commandments, which the Lord commanded Moses for the children of Israel in Mount Sinai." I hope you enjoyed this quiz. Stay tuned for the next quiz in the series on Numbers.
